text.div:
VISA/VRSA (Tests for Vancomycin Resistance Gene)

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    48814-8 Vancomycin resistance vanA gene [Presence] by Molecular method
    62261-3 Vancomycin resistance vanA + vanB genes [Presence] by Molecular method
    69379-6 Vancomycin resistance vanA and vanB and vanC1 and vanC2 genes [Identifier] by Molecular method
    72421-1 Vancomycin resistance vanB gene [Presence] by Molecular method
    72836-0 Vancomycin resistance vanC2+vanC3 genes [Presence] by Molecular method
    72837-8 Vancomycin resistance vanC1 gene [Presence] by Molecular method
    75753-4 Vancomycin resistance vanD gene [Presence] by Molecular method
    85787-0 Vancomycin resistance vanA + vanB genes [Presence] by NAA with non-probe detection in Positive blood culture
    88252-2 Vancomycin resistance vanA gene [Presence] by Probe in Positive blood culture
    88253-0 Vancomycin resistance vanB gene [Presence] by Probe in Positive blood culture
    92241-9 Vancomycin [Susceptibility] by Genotype method
